I downloaded the binary of Heritrix 1.0.0, and tried to test it with
the  seed: www.uiuc.edu. It succeed in dns lookup, but failed to read
robots.txt (really exist).  The error log is as follows.


20040920124037089    -3          - http://www.uiuc.edu/robots.txt P
http://www.uiuc.edu/ no-type #001 - - -
 java.io.IOException: Socket timedout: Read timed out
	at
org.archive.io.RecordingInputStream.readFullyOrUntil(RecordingInputStream.java:205)
	at org.archive.crawler.fetcher.FetchHTTP.innerProcess(FetchHTTP.java:282)
	at org.archive.crawler.framework.Processor.process(Processor.java:106)
	at
org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.processCrawlUri(ToeThread.java:267)
	at org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.run(ToeThread.java:146)


My another questioin is, how about if there's no robots.txt? it seems,
in the normal setting, if there's no robots.txt for a server, the html
pages on it will not be crawled. 

thanks
